20101224163042.000|20101224163045.000|TR0|Beltway and beyond assumes will be 
20101224163045.000|20101224163047.000|TR0|gridlock.
20101224163047.000|20101224163050.000|TR0|
20101224163050.000|20101224163052.000|TR0|But while it was a tough year for 
20101224163052.000|20101224163054.000|TR0|President Obama, it was an even tougher 
20101224163054.000|20101224163057.000|TR0|one for those Americans living on the Gulf 
20101224163057.000|20101224163059.000|TR0|Coast.  On April 20th, the Deepwater 
20101224163059.000|20101224163102.000|TR0|Horizon exploded, killing 11 men and 
20101224163102.000|20101224163104.000|TR0|beginning what would come to be known as 
20101224163104.000|20101224163106.000|TR0|the worst environmental disaster in U.S. 
20101224163106.000|20101224163109.000|TR0|history.
20101224163109.000|20101224163111.000|TR0|
20101224163111.000|20101224163113.000|TR0|For three months, oil gushed from that 
20101224163113.000|20101224163116.000|TR0|severed well head.  And while the precise 
20101224163116.000|20101224163118.000|TR0|damage will never be known, it is 
20101224163118.000|20101224163121.000|TR0|estimated that more than 205 million 
20101224163121.000|20101224163123.000|TR0|gallons of oil poured into the Gulf.  
20101224163123.000|20101224163125.000|TR0|There was a terrible price to pay.  
20101224163125.000|20101224163128.000|TR0|Burn-offs and boom, underwater plumes and 
20101224163128.000|20101224163130.000|TR0|oil-soaked wildlife - the economic 
20101224163130.000|20101224163133.000|TR0|ramifications rocked the region.
20101224163133.000|20101224163135.000|TR0|
20101224163135.000|20101224163137.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)
20101224163137.000|20101224163140.000|TR0|
20101224163140.000|20101224163142.000|TR0|TONY HAYWARD, CEO, BP:  There's no one who 
20101224163142.000|20101224163144.000|TR0|wants this thing over more than I do.  You 
20101224163144.000|20101224163147.000|TR0|know, I'd love my life back.
20101224163147.000|20101224163149.000|TR0|
20101224163149.000|20101224163152.000|TR0|(END VIDEO CLIP)
20101224163152.000|20101224163154.000|TR0|
20101224163154.000|20101224163156.000|TR0|BALDWIN:  And even after the well was 
20101224163156.000|20101224163159.000|TR0|finally capped in mid-July, the 
20101224163159.000|20101224163201.000|TR0|environmental damage still remains 
20101224163201.000|20101224163204.000|TR0|unknown.       Just a few weeks after the 
20101224163204.000|20101224163206.000|TR0|well was capped, another tragedy, but this 
20101224163206.000|20101224163208.000|TR0|one would come with a happy ending.  You 
20101224163208.000|20101224163211.000|TR0|know the story.  August 5th, 33 Chilean 
20101224163211.000|20101224163213.000|TR0|miners were plunged into dusk and 
20101224163213.000|20101224163216.000|TR0|darkness.  A mine and world (ph) Chile 
20101224163216.000|20101224163218.000|TR0|collapsed trapping the men more than 2,000 
20101224163218.000|20101224163220.000|TR0|feet below the surface earth.
20101224163220.000|20101224163223.000|TR0|
20101224163223.000|20101224163225.000|TR0|Weeks passed as frantic rescue efforts 
20101224163225.000|20101224163227.000|TR0|were attempted and failed, but on August 
20101224163227.000|20101224163230.000|TR0|22nd, a miracle.  A five and a half inch 
20101224163230.000|20101224163232.000|TR0|borehole reached an emergency shelter room 
20101224163232.000|20101224163235.000|TR0|in the mine.  And when the drill bit 
20101224163235.000|20101224163237.000|TR0|returned to the surface there was a note 
20101224163237.000|20101224163239.000|TR0|attached, quote, "We are all right in the 
20101224163239.000|20101224163242.000|TR0|shelter, the 33 of us."  The 33 men would 
20101224163242.000|20101224163244.000|TR0|spend a record- breaking 69 days below the 
20101224163244.000|20101224163247.000|TR0|earth before the world would witness their 
20101224163247.000|20101224163249.000|TR0|ascent to freedom.
20101224163249.000|20101224163251.000|TR0|
20101224163251.000|20101224163254.000|TR0|Which brings us to the number one story of 
20101224163254.000|20101224163256.000|TR0|2010, a story that has no happy ending, 
20101224163256.000|20101224163258.000|TR0|but one that shook the world and stirred 
20101224163258.000|20101224163301.000|TR0|an outpouring of grief far beyond the 
20101224163301.000|20101224163303.000|TR0|borders of the tiny island nation of Haiti.
20101224163303.000|20101224163306.000|TR0|
20101224163306.000|20101224163308.000|TR0|The earthquake hit early Tuesday evening, 
20101224163308.000|20101224163310.000|TR0|the 12th of January. Seismologists 
20101224163310.000|20101224163313.000|TR0|measured the quake at a magnitude 7.0.  
20101224163313.000|20101224163315.000|TR0|But it would be far more difficult to wrap

20101224163318.000|20101224163320.000|TR0|human tragedy - 230,000 dead, more than a

20101224164343.000|20101224164345.000|TR0|(on camera):  ABM, which is an arterial 
20101224164345.000|20101224164348.000|TR0|venous malformation, the arteries and 
20101224164348.000|20101224164350.000|TR0|veins sort of grow in a tangle.
20101224164350.000|20101224164353.000|TR0|
20101224164353.000|20101224164355.000|TR0|WOLF:  Yes.
20101224164355.000|20101224164357.000|TR0|
20101224164357.000|20101224164400.000|TR0|GUPTA:  What happened that day?
20101224164400.000|20101224164402.000|TR0|

20101224165304.000|20101224165307.000|TR0|e-mail.

20101224165314.000|20101224165316.000|TR0|Christmas.  After the horrific siege of 
20101224165316.000|20101224165318.000|TR0|the Baghdad church in October that killed 
20101224165318.000|20101224165321.000|TR0|and wounded dozens, a bloodbath claimed by 
20101224165321.000|20101224165323.000|TR0|a group affiliated with al Qaeda, and a 
20101224165323.000|20101224165326.000|TR0|series of bombings targeting Christmas in 
20101224165326.000|20101224165328.000|TR0|their homes, church leaders say the 
20101224165328.000|20101224165330.000|TR0|threats are taken seriously.
20101224165330.000|20101224165333.000|TR0|

20101224165335.000|20101224165338.000|TR0|their homes in Baghdad and the northern 
20101224165338.000|20101224165340.000|TR0|city of Mosul in recent months as a direct 
20101224165340.000|20101224165342.000|TR0|result of the renewed violence.
20101224165342.000|20101224165345.000|TR0|
20101224165345.000|20101224165347.000|TR0|Iraq is estimated to have had more than a 
20101224165347.000|20101224165349.000|TR0|million Christians before the U.S.-led 
20101224165349.000|20101224165352.000|TR0|invasion in 2003, but the violence and 
20101224165352.000|20101224165354.000|TR0|persecution that followed has driven about 
20101224165354.000|20101224165357.000|TR0|half of them out.  Church leaders are 
20101224165357.000|20101224165359.000|TR0|worried about another exodus and trying to 
20101224165359.000|20101224165401.000|TR0|stop it.

20101224165459.000|20101224165501.000|TR0|dazzling treat for the holidays.  A 
20101224165501.000|20101224165503.000|TR0|country road in Massachusetts comes to

20101224165508.000|20101224165511.000|TR0|the rural neighborhood from a car dealer.
